name: Vlinder Fashion Queen Dress Up
description:
Do you like fashion games with styling, dress up and make up?
In Fashion Queen, there are all kinds of fashionable clothes and exquisite accessories, match Fashion Doll clothes, Fashion Queen clothes as you like!

[Play Fashion Queen]: Match & Dress Up, millions of fashionistas, designers & fashion stylists around the world playing Vlinder Fashion Queen - Dress Up games Studio!

[Become an excellent stylist]: Participate in the model competition fashion show, show off your fashion designer skills in this fun fashion queen & dress up games! Design your exclusive look!

It will definitely meet your design needs and bring you a different dressing experience!
Now, all the girls want you to help them choose fashionable dresses! Dress up for these cute girls, help your model win various fashion catwalk shows and beauty photo PK contests, and become the queen of fashion!
